item.title: By: chopstik

item.description: A blog entry that I can really relate to. Excellent thought and one that I try very hard to adhere to. Fortunately, I've never had any problem asking questions of others...

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
Ah those were some beautiful queries. Only surpassed when I saw the nonsense that seems to come out of informix on a daily basis ðŸ™‚

I suppose that is the good thing about having friends in high places. You can always find help from someone who knows more than you. Unless of course your new job blocks google chat. Or you are Chrissie and you can’t find such a person ðŸ˜‰
